A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I honestly don't understand where all the hate and backlash is coming from for this movie. I was really happy with how it turned out! There were a few scenes that I could've done without (the Canto Bight storyline wasn't my thing) but overall\, I think Rian Johnson has created a visually stunning film\, and added more depth to the new characters we were introduced to in The Force Awakens.
